Text: thanx,

why rars man!?

your ups are better than that!

get one corrupt file and it's done...
I don't think there are any advantages for keeping HQ torrents rarred. Your torrent client should already be doing the hash checking and automatically re-downloading corrupt chunks

plus, by leaving your content rarred, you are wasting everyone's time and money, because after someone with a fast connection downloads and unrars it, they are less likely keep on seeding because rarred files use 2x the disk space.

I've downloaded a couple dozen unrarred, HD quality movies and I've never had a problem with opening/playing the finished download. However, the first time I tried downloading a rarred film, I was hit with 3 corrupt because they were either corrupt from the start or it was that they were rar files which came with external checksums, thereby disabling the built-in auto hash-checking provided by my torrent client. I have refused to download rarred content ever since.

"some will be packed, some will be unpacked"

I appreciate your unpacked uploads, I really do... but why may i ask?

and have you read this article from torrentfreak:

http://torrentfreak.com/unpack-rar-archives-before-you-release-a-torrent/
Thank you! :)

Please stop sharing shit in .rars. Most people just extract the movie and erase the archives right away because they use up free space. If you share the actual movies instead people will normally share at least before they burn/copy it and erase it from their disks.

That's actually what I do before I start a torrent. If it's just a sample and unaltered mkv, I download, seed, and STFU. If it's rarred and there's not already an unrarred version that I can find, I start complaining/whining. It's as simple as that. Don't wanna hear my blabber? fuck off verbose.

The rars are from when it first hits the scene and the people who make all this shit possible pass it along to one another via non bt routes where rars ARE advantageous for quickly resolving corrupted transfers.

So personally, the fact that they make getting free high quality movies for free possible in the first place absolves them of the miniscule task of unraring it before it hits the mainstream torrent sites.

So shit the fuck up and thank the man for doing this at all.
